DOC.brief_summary: This survey is conducted for preparing application materials for re-examination under the Pharmaceutical Affairs Laws and its Enforcement Regulation. Its aim is to reconfirm the clinical usefulness of EMEMD (aprepitant) through collecting the safety information according to the Re-examination Regulation for New Drugs.
DOC.criteria: Participants who are treated with EMEND for the first time as per the EMEND label Contraindication to EMEND
